courses.title: Bachelor of Business Commerce
courses.description: A comprehensive program covering business commerce fundamentals and advanced concepts.

subjects.title: Introduction to Business
subjects.description: Fundamentals of business operations and management.

subjects.title: Principles of Accounting
subjects.description: Basic accounting concepts and financial statements.

subjects.title: Business Economics
subjects.description: Economic principles applied to business decision-making.

subjects.title: Business Law
subjects.description: Legal framework governing business operations.

subjects.title: Marketing Management
subjects.description: Principles and strategies of marketing in business.

subjects.title: Financial Management
subjects.description: Managing financial resources and investment decisions.

subjects.title: Strategic Management
subjects.description: Formulating and implementing business strategies.

subjects.title: International Business
subjects.description: Global business operations and cross-cultural management.

subjects.title: Business Ethics
subjects.description: Ethical considerations in business decision-making.

courses.title: Bachelor of Business Administration
courses.description: A program designed to develop management skills and business acumen for future business leaders.

subjects.title: Principles of Management
subjects.description: Fundamentals of management theory and practice.

subjects.title: Business Communication
subjects.description: Effective communication in business contexts.

subjects.title: Microeconomics
subjects.description: Economic principles at the individual and firm level.

subjects.title: Organizational Behavior
subjects.description: Human behavior in organizational settings.

subjects.title: Marketing Research
subjects.description: Methods and techniques for market research.

subjects.title: Human Resource Management
subjects.description: Managing human resources in organizations.

subjects.title: Operations Management
subjects.description: Managing production and service operations.

subjects.title: Business Analytics
subjects.description: Data-driven decision making in business.

subjects.title: Entrepreneurship
subjects.description: Starting and managing new business ventures.

subjects.description: Legal aspects of business in Gujarati medium.

subjects.title: Cost Accounting (Gujarati)
subjects.description: Cost accounting principles in Gujarati medium.
